name: DOWNFALL (itch) (PRINCESS INTERNET CAFé)
description:
What if I made a game like BREA🌱HE but evil

PRINCESS INTERNET CAFé - Apr 06, 2023, 23:59

____________________

A short bitsy experience created for O2A2 VN Jam ~ Queer Edition ~.

Content Warning

The game contains mentions of anxiety, alcohol and drugs

Controls
  1. Click on the screen when the game loads up.
  2. Press and hold WASD to move and to advance the text.
  3. Control the camera with the mouse or the arrow keys.
  4. Collect orbs.
